item.title: Drops problem
item.dc:creator: @T-R-A-V-I-S T-R-A-V-I-S
item.description:
@T-R-A-V-I-S wrote:

im trying to add drops for death spawns and i dont know what problem is

ill post codes

} public static int deathspawn[] = {1038,4151,6916,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995}; public static int randomdeathspawn() { return deathspawn[(int)(Math.random()*deathspawn.length)]; } 
}</blockquote>
} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1614) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomdeathspawn(),npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

and compiler says

NPCHandler.java:1147: addItem(int,int,int,int,int,boolean) in ItemHandler cannot be applied to (int,int,int,int,boolean) ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomdeathspawn(),npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

anyone know problem?
